title: Plant Monitoring System
bullets: Designed a Raspberry Pi 5 Hardware Attached on Top (HAT) to create a complete monitoring solution for an autonomous duckweed growth system, specifically designed for a space environment.
Integrated various sensors, including temperature, air quality, light, and CO2, along with an infrared camera, using the I2C protocol for data communication.

title: Boeing Design Challenge
bullets: Created a design pitch for asteroid sample retrieval in the Boeing Design Challenge hosted at USC.
Presented design to panel of Boeing engineers; placed 4th overall in which top 5 teams present designs
